equipment.name: Loop
base_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>71.28%</text> of normal damage.
+21% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills

equipment.name: Flickerstep
base_affixes: Each enemy you Evade through reduces your active Ultimate Cooldown by <text class='c_random'>4.32</text> seconds, up to <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Lidless Wall
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> While you have an active <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text>, hitting an enemy outside of a <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> has up to a <text class='c_random'>36.94%</text> chance to spawn an additional <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> at their location. Each of your active Sacrifice bonuses increase the chance by <text class='c_number'>37.5%</text> and the total additional <text class='c_important'>Bone Storms</text> you can have by <text class='c_number'>1.5</text>.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Restore +20.25% Primary Resource

equipment.name: Runic Gloves
base_affixes: +26.25% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills
strikethrough_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>33.54%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.
added_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>70.65%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Pants
base_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> has a <text class='c_random'>38.63%</text> chance to spawn a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.
+0.03 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently
strikethrough_affixes: 13.91% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

equipment.name: Doom Armor
strikethrough_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.48%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>88.64%</text>.
added_affixes: Each time that <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> damages an enemy, gain a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> equal to <text class='c_random'>6.9%</text> of your Base Life for <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Spellbinder
base_affixes: Whenever your <text class='c_important'>Blood</text> Skills <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> you gain <text class='c_random'>72.85%</text> Attack Speed for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Banished Lord's Talisman
base_affixes: After you spend <text class='c_number'>450</text> of your Primary Resource, your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill is guaranteed to <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text>. Your Critical Strikes that <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> deal <text class='c_random'>144.11%</text> increased damage.

equipment.name: Boneweave Helm
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>46.6%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.54%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>92.23%</text>.
